content.raw:
Whatever the reason is, it must be connected to the fact that I can’t reproduce this bug on either of my machines. “this” appears to be implied and the totalPoseError is being initialized to 0.

This PR also works, so I’m approving it, but it might be good to get confirmation from someone who can reproduce the error that we actually fixed it.

Whatever the reason is, it must be connected to the fact that I can’t reproduce this bug on either of my machines. “this” appears to be implied and the totalPoseError is being initialized to 0.

This PR also works, so I’m approving it, but it might be good to get confirmation from someone who can reproduce the error that we actually fixed it.
